Definition: You are given a piece of text. Your task is to classify the text based on whether it includes hate speech against a religion or a person/group of people based on their religion. If the text includes hate speech against a religion, answer with 'religious hate'. If the text does not include hate speech against a religion, answer with 'not religious hate'.
